attributes.action: Suspend public road tax payments until pot holes are repaired
attributes.additional_details: Evidence should not be required as every Road Street and Avenue has craters for all to see
attributes.background: As a driver and a road tax council tax and all other tax payer, I recently encountered one of many pot holes and subsequently needed not one but two new tyres much to my dismay I find my self constantly veering and steering around what can only be described as craters in the local A B roads.
